_sText:
simply paste the "bin" folder into your sourcesdk folder
left click = spread fire of helicopter bombs right click = human cannon
1. shoots red helicopter bombs with left click 2. shoots 2 people at once with right click 3. to move the cannon, use W A S D
known bugs: If a person gets stuck in front of the barrel when it tried to turn or move up/down, the base will continue roatating but the barrels will stay. This bug does not occur if you are in the cannon barrels Every now and then you might fly out of the barrel early ================================================== Still not perfect although MUCH better than v1. You dont go backwards anymore You no longer get stuck on the spinny thingys New textures Crosshairs added :D **NOTE** if you are going to use more than one in the same map you will have to rename everything on one of the cannons (name, outputs, targets etc...)
